title: Classic Car Club Founders Zac Moseley, Mike Prichinello, Phil Kavanaugh!
description:
If you like cars, you need to know about Classic Car Club Manhattan. In a city where parking is expensive and private cars rare, CCC created a club where you can rent awesome cars that enthusiasts love. They've had McLarens, Porsches, old Bronco's and Corvettes, classic sports cars, race cars, and exotics. They basically assembled a dream garage of cars that members can take out and enjoy. It's brilliant, and their wealth of knowledge about car reliability and markets is almost unmatched. https://classiccarclubmanhattan.com/fleet/

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/NcALqK7IrqQ

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @cccmanhattan @michael_prichinello @zac_moseley 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @cccmanhattan @michael_prichinello @zac_moseley 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
